abstract_summ: The novel coronavirus (COVID-19) is now in a horrific situation around the world . Prediction about the number of infected and death cases may help to take immediate action to prevent the epidemic as well as control the situation of a country . The study uses exploratory data analysis to report the current situation and uses time-series forecasting methods to predict the future trends . The authors make the sixty days ahead forecast for each country which will be beneficial for the policymakers .
